nano_banana_generator.prompt_template: Create an image with Nano Banana model. Description: ${description}. Style: ${style}. Aspect ratio: ${aspectRatio}. Target resolution: ${resolution}. Focus on premium lighting, refined materials, and modern composition.

super_resolution_upscaler.prompt_template: Enhance image details from ${originalResolution} to ${targetResolution}. Preserve textures, eliminate artifacts, and maintain balanced contrast.

nano_banana_transformer.prompt_template: Transform the uploaded scene using Nano Banana. Base direction: ${description}. Preserve original style family: ${originalStyle}. Maintain proportional balance across ${originalResolution}. Blend edits seamlessly with realistic lighting.
